biotools.summary: Ontoclick is a web browser extension to facilitate biomedical knowledge curation. Ontoclick is a web browser extension for Chrome and Firefox browsers that lets the user highlight a piece of text and then tries to find a matching Ontology term for it.

bioschemas.name: Ontoclick
